dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The CARLA simulator provides a simulated environment for autonomous driving research, allowing for the generation of lidar point clouds and testing of dynamic object detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: CARLA simulator

dcterms:creator: E. Francis
K. Theodora
H. Alexander
L. Bastian
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is used for evaluating computer vision algorithms, particularly in the context of autonomous driving, providing labeled data for dynamic obstacles.
dcterms:title: KITTI dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Wang
R. Yang
B. Cao
W. Xu
Y. Lin
dcterms:description: The Zpark dataset includes dense 3D semantically labeled point clouds and ground truth camera poses, aimed at improving localization and segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Zpark dataset

dcterms:creator: E. Francis
K. Theodora
H. Alexander
L. Bastian
dcterms:description: The Virtual KITTI dataset is a synthetic dataset designed to provide a realistic environment for training and testing computer vision algorithms in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: Virtual KITTI dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Ma
Y. Li
J. Li
C. Wang
R. Wang
M. A. Chapman
dcterms:description: The 3D point cloud dataset provides mobile laser scanned point clouds for road object detection and extraction, serving as a comprehensive review of methodologies.
dcterms:title: 3D point cloud dataset
